elements.title: established by royal charter
elements.contents: ... that the College of William & Mary was established by royal charter (pictured) 333 years ago today?

elements.title: Richard Lee Morton
elements.contents: ... that Richard Lee Morton became the head of the College of William & Mary's history department after two years of teaching?

elements.title: Chandler Court and Pollard Park
elements.contents: ... that Chandler Court and Pollard Park, which were designed and occupied by William & Mary faculty, have been called "two of Williamsburg's most appealing twentieth-century neighborhoods"?

elements.title: Denver Mills
elements.contents: ... that Denver Mills, the first underclassman to be captain of the William & Mary football team, also played in the army and a single NFL game?

elements.title: William and Mary Quarterly
elements.contents: ... that William & Mary's president was unable to get the college to fund the William and Mary Quarterly, so he paid for it himself?

elements.title: Orlando Jones
elements.contents: ... that Orlando Jones, the maternal grandfather of Martha Washington, was one of William & Mary's first students?

elements.title: five speeches by William & Mary students
elements.contents: ... that five speeches by William & Mary students helped to move Virginia's capital and establish Williamsburg?

elements.title: Althea Hunt
elements.contents: ... that Althea Hunt founded the William & Mary Theatre, but discouraged students from trying to make a career of it?

elements.title: a man with little linguistic ability
elements.contents: ... that Thomas Jefferson pushed William & Mary to hire a man with little linguistic ability as its first professor of modern languages?
